Attempt to rile.text: You're going away for a long time for what you've done.

coop.text: What? No, you've got it all wrong.

sly.text: I know what you're trying to do and it's not working.

Attempt to calm.text: Hey, listen. You cooperate, things'll turn out okay for you. Understand?

coop.text: Yeah, yeah. Okay, what do you need to know?

sly.text: That won't work on me. You cops all think you're pretty smart, huh?

intense.text: No, I think this time is the end of the line. I think you know it, too.

Alibi?.text: What are you doing at the scene of the crime?

coop.text: Got a call from a friend...

sly.text: Nothing in particular. Am I being detained?

Establish Trust.text: I'm on your side, Cooper. I just need you to trust me and point me in the right direction.

coop.text: Okay, I think I can do that.

sly.text: Yeah, serve and protect, right? Whatever you say, pal.

intense.text: Trust is what got me into this mess!

Lay Down Law.text: I'm in charge here! You better start answering questions if you don't want us to hang this whole thing on you.

sly.text: You're not fooling anyone with that big act, buddy.

intense.text: So arrest me. I've got nothing left to say.

coop.text: A friend, or so I thought.

sly.text: A real snake, a bit like you.

intense.text: No, I'm not talking. He'll kill me too!

coop.text: He's dangerous. Should've never gotten mixed up with him in the first place. You won't find him neither. Keeps a tight shift.

sly.text: He's not on any police database, if that's what you're asking.

intense.text: This is all his fault. He did this to me.

Problems with law?.text: You've brushed with the law before, I'm guessing.

coop.text: I've been in and out for years. Everyone out here has.

sly.text: This isn't the first time I'll go down for something I didn't do.

intense.text: Listen, I didn't do it, okay!?

Conjecture.text: Let me guess, your pal made you an offer you couldn't refuse and now he's got some real dirt on you.

coop.text: Yeah, something like that. I'll tell you what I know as long as you keep that lunatic away from me.

sly.text: I bet you think you're pretty clever, connecting the dots like that? Guess what, you're wrong.

intense.text: Are you trying to be funny man?! I'll show you the dirt.

Bad cop.text: You will go down for this. There's more than enough circumstantial evidence here to put you away for the rest of your life.

coop.text: Haven't you been listening to me? For the last time, this wasn't me!

sly.text: You can't play me like that.

intense.text: This is insane! I won't go down for this, okay? I'll tell you what I know, dammit!

Friend did What.text: So what exactly did your friend do, anyway?

coop.text: He told me to meet him here or else...

sly.text: Let's just say he was gonna make one of my problems disappear.

Reassure.text: Don't worry about your friend, he can't hurt you when we're around.

coop.text: Alright... but uh, I'm not scared of him.

sly.text: Right, tell me more about your 'excellent' witness protection.

intense.text: Who says I'm afraid of him? He should be afraid of me!
